  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_411</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_411</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Semejanza y homotecia</string>
            <string language="en">Similarity_&_homothety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Similarity_&_homothety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Similarity_&_homothety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Similarity_&_homothety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Similarity_&_homothety</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Similarity_&_homothety</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de semejanza y homotecia en el plano. Se estudian los teoremas de Thales, del cateto y de la altura de un triángulo.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of similarity and scaling on a plane. It studies the Thales's theorem and the theorems of the cathetus and the altitude of a triangle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cateto</string>
            <string language="en">cathetus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">homotecia</string>
            <string language="en">scaling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">semejanza</string>
            <string language="en">similarity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema de Thales</string>
            <string language="en">Thales's theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">altura</string>
            <string language="en">altitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der Ähnlichkeit und der Skalierung auf 
einer Fläche zu erklären. Sie studiert das Theorem des Thaless
und die Theoreme des cathetus und die Höhe eines Dreiecks.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de la similitude et de la 
graduation sur un avion. Il étudie le théorème de Thales 
et les théorèmes du cathetus et l'altitude d'une triangle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar o
conceito da similaridade e do scaling em um plano. Estuda o 
theorem do Thales e os theorems do cathetus e a altura de um 
triângulo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni spiegare
il concetto di somiglianza e di scaling su un aereo. Studia il 
teorema del Thales ed i teoremi del cathetus e l'altezza di un 
triangolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της ομοιότητας και του ξελεπιάσματος σε
ένα αεροπλάνο. Μελετά το θεώρημα του Thales και τα 
θεωρήματα του cathetus και το ύψος ενός τριγώνου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">cathetus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skalierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ähnlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorem Thaless</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Höhe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cathetus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graduation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">similitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
